headline: RFK Jr. Clears A Key Hurdle To Head Up HHS. Why His Nomination Is A Biotech Black Box.
summary: RFK Jr. cleared a key hurdle Tuesday after the Senate Finance Committee voted along party lines to send his nomination to the full chamber.

raw.headline: RFK Jr. Clears A Key Hurdle To Head Up HHS. Why His Nomination Is A Biotech Black Box.
raw.summary: RFK Jr. cleared a key hurdle Tuesday after the Senate Finance Committee voted along party lines to send his nomination to the full chamber.

headline: RFK Jr. Clears Committee Vote, Is On Track to Become Health Secretary
summary: The Finance Committee voted to forward the nomination of Robert F. Kennedy Jr. for health secretary to the full Senate.  WASHINGTON—The nomination of  Robert F. Kennedy Jr.  to lead the Health and Human Services Department advanced Tuesday after a key swing Republican voted for the nominee in the Senate Finance Committee, likely clearing his path to confirmation.  Sen.  Bill Cassidy  (R., La.), a medical doctor, voted with all of the committee’s Republicans to support Kennedy’s confirmation.

Kennedy Jr.  to lead the Health and Human Services Department advanced Tuesday after a key swing Republican voted for the nominee in the Senate Finance Committee, likely clearing his path to confirmation.  Sen.  Bill Cassidy  (R., La.), a medical doctor, voted with all of the committee’s Republicans to support Kennedy’s confirmation.

headline: Health, pharma stocks fall as RFK Jr. clears crucial vote
summary: Health and pharmaceutical stocks — including Moderna (MRNA), Pfizer (PFE), BioNTech (BNTX), Novavax (NVAX) — are under pressure on Tuesday after Robert F. Kennedy Jr. passed the Senate Finance Committee's vote on the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) Secretary nominee. His nomination will now proceed to a full Senate vote. Wealth anchor Brad Smith is joined by Seana Smith in analyzing the market reaction, exploring several of Kennedy Jr.'s controversial views on healthcare issues, particularly vaccines. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Angel Smith
